title: INV-009 Corrective Actions: Fix Failing Test and Requalify qms-cli

comment:
PRE-REVIEW: REQUEST UPDATES

**Frontmatter Verification:**
- title: 'INV-009 Corrective Actions: Fix Failing Test and Requalify qms-cli' - VERIFIED
- revision_summary: 'Initial draft' - VERIFIED (N/A for v0.x)

**SOP-002 Section 6 Compliance:**
- All 12 required sections present and properly structured
- No prohibited placeholders (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) in pre-approved content
- Execution placeholders appropriate for pre-execution status

**DEFICIENCY IDENTIFIED - INCOMPLETE CAPA COVERAGE:**

The document title and Section 1 Purpose state: 'This CR implements INV-009 CAPA-001 through CAPA-005'

However, only 3 of 5 CAPAs are addressed:

| CAPA | INV-009 Description | CR-050 Coverage |
|------|---------------------|-----------------|
| CAPA-001 | Fix test, verify CI, update RTM | ADDRESSED (Sections 5.1, 5.4, EI-1 to EI-4) |
| CAPA-002 | CI on all branches | ADDRESSED (Section 5.2) |
| CAPA-003 | GitHub branch protection | NOT ADDRESSED |
| CAPA-004 | RTM review checklist update | NOT ADDRESSED |
| CAPA-005 | CI runs ALL tests | ADDRESSED (Section 5.3) |

**CAPA-003 Missing:** INV-009 specifies 'Add GitHub branch protection requiring CI to pass before merge' - CR-050 contains no implementation for branch protection rules.

**CAPA-004 Missing:** INV-009 specifies 'Update RTM review checklist to require verification that commit hash is not TBD' - CR-050 contains no checklist update.

**Required Action:** Either:
1. Add CAPA-003 and CAPA-004 implementation to CR-050, OR
2. Remove the claim of implementing 'CAPA-001 through CAPA-005' and clarify which CAPAs this CR addresses (with justification for deferring CAPA-003/004 to separate CRs)

Per SOP-003 Section 6.4, CAPA completion requires child CRs to be referenced and confirmed closed. If CR-050 claims all 5 CAPAs but omits 2, INV-009 cannot be properly closed.

PRE-REVIEW COMPLETE - RECOMMEND FOR APPROVAL

**Frontmatter Verification:**
- title: 'INV-009 Corrective Actions: Fix Failing Test and Requalify qms-cli' - VERIFIED
- revision_summary: 'Added missing CAPAs (CAPA-003 branch protection, CAPA-004 RTM review checklist)' - VERIFIED

**Previous Deficiency Resolution:**
- CAPA-003 (branch protection): NOW ADDRESSED in Section 5.4 and EI-4
- CAPA-004 (RTM review checklist): NOW ADDRESSED in Section 5.5 and EI-5

**CAPA Traceability Verification (All 5 CAPAs):**
| CAPA | Description | CR-050 Section | EI |
|------|-------------|----------------|-----|
| CAPA-001 | Fix test, verify CI, update RTM | 5.1, 5.6 | EI-1,2,3,6 |
| CAPA-002 | CI on all branches | 5.2 | EI-1 |
| CAPA-003 | GitHub branch protection | 5.4 | EI-4 |
| CAPA-004 | RTM review checklist | 5.5 | EI-5 |
| CAPA-005 | CI runs ALL tests | 5.3 | EI-1 |

**SOP-002 Section 6 Compliance:**
- All 12 required sections present and properly structured
- Sections 2.2-2.3: Files Affected updated to include checklist file
- Sections 3-4: Current/Proposed State updated with items 3-4 for CAPA-003/004
- Section 5: Change Description includes 5.4 and 5.5 for missing CAPAs
- Section 7: Impact Assessment includes GitHub repo settings and CLAUDE.md
- Section 9: Implementation Plan includes Phases 9.4 and 9.5
- Section 10: Execution table expanded to 7 EIs (EI-1 through EI-7)

**Placeholder Content Check:**
- No TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX in pre-approved content (Sections 1-9)
- Execution placeholders in Section 10-11 appropriate for pre-execution status

**Typos/Errors:** None found
**Formatting:** Consistent throughout

RECOMMENDATION: Approve for pre-execution. All INV-009 CAPAs are now properly addressed.

PRE-REVIEW COMPLETE - RECOMMEND FOR APPROVAL
